labels.value: I have read and agreed to the Terms & Conditions.

You agree and understand that Assurant provides coverage for mechanical breakdown for select products such as audio & streaming devices, TVs, home theater systems, laptops, desktops, tablets, PC peripherals, routers, and modems. Under the Premium Plan, Assurant also provides coverage for accidental damage from handling of laptops, monitors, PC peripherals, tablets, and personal wearables. DIRECTV devices are not covered under DIRECTV TECH PROTECT and may be covered under DIRECTV device warranty/replacement process.

Assurant support including set up, troubleshooting, and home wi-fi optimization are available immediately. Claims will be fulfilled by Assurant and customers must wait 30 days from plan activation before filing a claim and the claim must have originated 30 days after plan activation. This applies when you start a new plan, switch plans, or restart after a DIRECTV Service Pause. A Service Fee for claim(s) will be charged directly from Assurant to the customer.

There is a $99 deductible, $2,000 claim limit over 12 months and $1,500 limit per claim.

You will be charged on a monthly basis at the then prevailing rate for your plan until cancelled.

A copy of the TECH PROTECT Service Contract Terms and Conditions is available at directv.com/techprotect for your review.

labels.value: Gemini is the newest DIRECTV client that allows customers to keep access to their world class DIRECTV Sat service with having additional connected features. For the best experience and enhanced features we recommend speeds of 25Mbps and up.

labels.shortDescription: First Disclaimer for Local Offers via Antenna (part 1)
labels.value: STOP & READ! This customer is in a special group that may be eligible to receive our best offer: a $15/month discount. They will get a no locals package price ($12 less than the locals price) plus an additional $3 Local Channels via Antenna discount to get their local channels from an antenna instead of from the satellite.

labels.shortDescription: First Disclaimer for Local Offers via Antenna (part 2)
labels.value:
BEFORE DISCUSSING WITH CUSTOMER:
Step 1: Check the customer's antenna signal strength. Visit this link: . Lookup the customer's address https://www.directv.com/tools/outdoor-signal-strength/ to see if they are a good candidate to get their local channels using an Antenna.
Step 2: Decide whether to make a locals via antenna offer
-If they have POOR signal strength, do not mention the offer, use the toggle to order Locals Satellite, and skip Step 3.
-If they have GOOD signal strength, go to Step 3.
Step 3: READ OUTLOUD

labels.shortDescription: First Disclaimer for Local Offers via Antenna (part 3)
labels.value:
Congratulations, you may be eligible for a special locals via antenna offer. If you opt-in and there is sufficient antenna signal strength at your location during install, you will receive our best offer: a $15 monthly discount for as long as you stay on this offer and a professionally-installed antenna at no extra cost. You will still be able to view and record local channels directly from your DIRECTV guide without switching remotes, connections, or TV inputs.
The strength of the antenna signal and the availability of local channels are not guaranteed.

labels.shortDescription: Second Disclaimer for Local Offers via Antenna
labels.value:
MUST READ:
By selecting a Locals via Antenna Package, you agree and acknowledge that the strength of antenna signal and availability of local channels are not guaranteed.
Viewing/recording local channels limited to two simultaneous devices. Local channels not available on mobile app streaming. Opt-out anytime by calling customer service. Offer subject to change and ends upon opting out, service cancellation or customer relocation.

Service subject to DIRECTV terms and conditions (see Legal Policy Center). Available only in the U.S. (excludes Puerto Rico and U.S.V.I.). Some offers may not be available through all channels and in select areas. Different offers may apply for eligible multi-dwelling units. Early termination fees apply for a maximum of $480, prorated at $20 per month over the 24-month term. Visit directv.com/legal/ or call for details. DIRECTV App: Req's compatible device and data connection or high-speed internet; data/internet charges may apply. Not all channels available to stream. Limited to up to 5 concurrent streams.

Pricing: ENTERTAINMENT $94.99/mo., CHOICE $117.98/mo., ULTIMATE $147.98/mo., PREMIER $192.98/mo. for 2 years. After 2 years, continues month to month at then-current prevailing prices unless canceled.Prices reflect base package prices plus one req'd. $10/mo. TV Access fee and, for CHOICE Pkg or higher, a Regional Sports Fee (RSF) of up to $17.99/mo. varies by location. May be lower in some areas. $10/mo. for each additional device added to your account and a one-time fee of $49 for each additional Gemini Device. Applicable use tax expense surcharge on retail value of installation, custom installation charges, equipment upgrades/add-ons, and certain other add'l fees & chrgs. See directv.com/directv-fees/ for additional information.
All programming, terms & restrictions subject to change at any time without notice. See directv.com for details.

Service subject to DIRECTV terms and conditions (see Legal Policy Center ). Available only in the U.S. (excludes Puerto Rico and U.S.V.I.). Visit directv.com/legal/ or call for details.
Requires high speed internet. Minimum internet speed of 8Mbps per stream recommended for optimal viewing. After 2 years, continues month to month at then-current prevailing prices unless cancelled. $10/mo. Autopay and Paperless Bill Discount: Must enroll in autopay & paperless bill within 30 days of TV activation to receive bill credit starting in 1-3 bill cycles (pay $10 more/mo. until discount begins). Must maintain autopay/paperless bill and valid email address to continue credits. Gemini Device requires high-speed internet for optimal performance.
DIRECTV Svc Terms: Subject to Equipment Lease & Customer Agreements. Equipment Non-Return-Fees: If service is cancelled, you must return your leased equipment. Failure to return any equipment will result in feesof $45 for each standard DIRECTV Receiver, each HD DIRECTV Receiver, each Genie Mini, $120 each Gemini/Gemini Air device and $135 for each DVR, HD DVR, Genie HD DVR and/or Genie 2 DIRECTV Receiver.

Your monthly bill will include the cost of your plan, equipment, and any additional services orders and is ${BILLING_AMOUNT} per month for the first {BILLING_MONTHS} months, plus any applicable taxes and surcharges. Viasat is a paperless company and your monthly bill will be delivered electronically via email each month.</br>All fees are automatically charged to your payment method on file.</br>Your first months bill will be charged to the payment method on file within 10-14 days of installation.
Viasat bills the monthly service fee and lease fee in advance. Your 1st bill will include a full month of service plus a pro-rated amount for any partial month of service.
As a reminder, today we are also collecting a onetime standard installation fee of ${INSTALLATION_FEE}.

labels.shortDescription: Viasat Billing No Installation Fee Disclosure
labels.value: We will pre-authorize your credit or debit card for $60.00 to confirm that you have a valid payment method. Our pre-authorization is immediately reversed. However, some card-issuing banks may hold the pre-authorized funds for up to approximately three days based on bank policies.
Your Internet service comes with a 24-month minimum service commitment If you cancel early, youll be automatically charged $15 for each remaining month of your minimum service commitment.

You have selected a CAFII service Plan. The Connect America Fund Phase II Auction Program, or CAFII Program, is a federal subsidy program created by the FCC that focuses on expanding high-speed internet access to millions of consumers who otherwise wouldn't have access. Viasat Carrier Services, Inc. a subsidiary of Viasat, Inc., is a proud participant in CAF II, and we offer plans with discounted satellite internet, and phone service (Viasat Voice), to qualifying service areas.</br>Qualifying customers who select one of the CAFII plans may also be eligible for the Federal Lifeline discount. If you would like to know more, please visit:https://www.viasat.com/satellite-internet/plans/carrier-services/.</br>Because you have elected to enroll in the [Connection25 or Voice-Only Connection plan], you may transition between the Connection25 and Voice-Only Connection plans at any time ; however, you may not transition to any other Viasat plans for 180 days following your installation date.

In order to get you the best offer available to you, we need to perform a credit check that has no negative impact on your credit. Do I have your permission to prequalify you by obtaining information from a consumer reporting agency to evaluate the offers available to you?

labels.shortDescription: Viasat Data Speed Choice Plan Disclosure
labels.value: Per our Unlimited Data Policy, after you use your allotted {DATA_AMOUNT} GB of High-Speed Data, you will continue to receive unlimited data (referred to as Standard Data); however, Viasat may prioritize Standard Data behind other customers during network congestion, which will result in slower speeds.

Internet speeds are up to, will vary and are not guaranteed.</br>VPN connections that some people use to work from home and some other remote computer access software may be very slow. Some VPNs may not work at all.</br>The performance of some games over the Internet is very poor and some games may not work at all.

labels.shortDescription: Viasat Data Speed Unleashed Plan Disclosure
labels.value: If your data usage is trending to exceed the typical usage of a residential user on our network, you may have reduced priority during times of network congestion resulting in slower speeds. Typical usage currently means usage trending to exceed 850 GBs in any 30-day period. The typical usage amount will vary based on network demands. Please visit www.viasat.com/legal for more details.

The monthly price for EasyCare is $9.99 per month. This monthly charge will be waived for your first 90 days of service. EasyCare covers our standard charge for service calls that we determine are necessary and for up to one annual dish relocation at your same service address for the discounted price of $95. You may cancel EasyCare at any time by calling Viasat Customer Care. However, if you do cancel, you may not be eligible to add EasyCare to your account again for up to 180 days.

We ask that if you or anyone in the home is feeling sick before the installation, please call us at 855-463-9333 to reschedule your appointment.</br>If you have a request, such as a request for the technician to wear a face mask, please let the technician know upon arrival.</br>Viasat may contact you about your upcoming installation at the phone number you provided.</br>We will be installing a satellite antenna at your house.</br>Usually on the roof or side of your house.</br>If you rent your house, make sure you have your landlords permission before your installation.</br>If your equipment installation requires a non-standard option, there may be additional charges at the time of installation. For example, an installer may charge up to $75 for a pole mount.

</br>Use of multiple devices with our service will result in slower speeds.</br>Remember this is leased equipment; you will have to send it back when you are done with it or be charged a $300 unreturned equipment fee.</br>Once the installer has completed your installation, youll [use your new internet service to - skip for Voice-Only customers] review and sign Viasats online customer agreement.</br>If you cant be there, make sure somebody over 18, whos authorized to sign the agreement on your behalf is available.</br>In order to avoid any service interruption, you may want to consider keeping your current Internet [/Voice] Service Provider until after your Viasat Internet [Voice] Service installation is completed.

At this time, the system is not showing any available installation dates in your area. Once we place your order, our back office installation team will work with a local installer to establish a due date, and that installer will contact you to inform you of that date. You should receive information regarding your installation date within the next 48 hours.

Viasat Shield is available for iPhone with iOS v9.0 or higher and for Android with v4.1 or higher. Viasat Shield application is not supported on tablets.</br>Your monthly service fee for Viasat Shield Premium is billed by and paid to Viasat. After you activate Viasat Shield Premium, it may take up to 40-hours for the premium features to be activated on your account. To deactivate Viasat Shield Premium features, please call Viasat Customer Care.

Your monthly Voice service fee is $35.00 [for CAF customers 29.99], in addition to your monthly Internet service fee. By bundling Internet and Voice, you will receive a saving of $10 per month on your Voice bill for the first full three months [for CAF customers 6 months] of services, provided you continue to receive both Viasat Internet and Voice services.</br>Your monthly service fees and any other fees you incur plus applicable taxes, E911 fees and other regulatory fees are automatically charged to your payment method on file. You will be billed separately for calls you make to destinations outside of the fifty United States, the District of Columbia and Canada and for directory assistance calls.

If you incur more than $200 in Voice toll charges in a billing period, we may charge them prior to the end of your billing cycle to your payment method on file. In order for your 911 calls to be properly directed to emergency services, Viasat must have the address on file where the Voice equipment is located. Please note the service address you provided today is the address to which emergency services will be directed when you call 911.

</br>You cannot receive the Voice service without also receiving Viasats Internet service, [Read this only to CAF-II Customers] unless you qualify for the Voice-Only Connection Plan.</br>Voice may not work well with fax machines, security systems or other analog data services and devices.

With some exceptions, Viasat will transfer your existing telephone number for use with Voice if you request that we do so.</br>It will take approximately 5-10 business days after you order Voice to complete a transfer.</br>Cancellations or changes to a transfer request within 72 hours of a scheduled transfer may result in additional fees.
